CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(packingArea1__c, "''")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(packingArea2__c, "''")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(packingArea3__c, "''")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(packingArea4__c, "''")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(packingArea5__c, "''")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(packingArea6__c, "''")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(packingArea7__c, "''"))), true, false)
CustomField.label: packingAreaDone
